product_name: WTB Nine Line 29er Comp Tire - 29 x 2.25
long_description: A lightweight race tire for 29ers, the WTB Nine Line 29er Comp Tire uses a micro square knob tread and supple casing to provide impressive traction and control during epic rides and races.
short_description: A lightweight race tire for 29ers, the WTB Nine Line 29er Comp Tire uses a micro square knob tread and supple casing to provide impressive traction and control during epic rides and races.
